statements: SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '123 Main St'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, receiver_address FROM transactions WHERE amount < 5000 ORDER BY sender_address DESC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT sender_address FROM transactions WHERE receiver_address LIKE '%Ave%' OR receiver_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY sender_address ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount = (SELECT MAX(amount) FROM transactions)
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT r.reason, r.auditor, t.amount FROM regulatory_audit r JOIN transactions t ON r.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 2000 ORDER BY r.audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.*, t.amount FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id AND t.amount < 500 ORDER BY u.created_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT regulator_name FROM regulators WHERE regulator_location = 'USA'
SELECT account_id, account_address, balance FROM accounts
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, a.balance FROM customers c JOIN accounts a ON c.customer_id = a.account_id WHERE c.customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM regulators WHERE regulator_location IN ('USA', 'UK', 'Canada');
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM accounts WHERE balance >= 1000) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 500;
SELECT wallet_address, wallet_balance FROM wallets WHERE wallet_balance > 1000.00;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_date FROM blocks ORDER BY block_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id IN (1, 3, 5);
